name: Timmy the Tiger's Big Adventure
description:
Timmy the Tiger's Big Adventure is a game about a tiger just living his best life. Then the world suddenly changes around him, making everything bigger and hostile. Fight your way through groups of possessed enemies, find a new place to call home, and maybe just discover a few secrets along the way.

This game was designed to be fun, not difficult to beat. It tells a story more than challenges the player, but that doesn't mean there aren't any tough fights in the game. Attempt them unprepared and your chances to survive are slim to none.
